author: Source: 4029TV.com
title: FBI, hackers bust bank robbing botnet - 4029TV.com
text:
American and British police have managed to stop a massive hacking operation that infected computers worldwide, stealing at least $10 million from the United States alone. Law enforcement -- with the help of several cybersecurity firms -- took control of a network of machines that distributed malicious software known as "Bugat," "Cridex" or "Dridex."
 4029TV.com.
